enableFlag.description: Enable Flag for Depth-based AEC Adjustments

movingAvgFilterLength.description: Number of taps for moving average process of gyro data

zoneTrigger.description: Gyro start and end values that define trigger region
Second level trigger zone using gyro data

data.description: trigger zone data depending on the type

enable.description: While absolute mode is enabled, i.e., enable=1, value monitor will use the the baseline value as a reference baseline. While absolute is disabled, i.e., enable=0, value monitor will adaptively update reference baseline according to the metafilter output (referring to frame2armed)

baseline.description: This parameter is utilized as absolute mode is enabled. While absolute mode is enabled, value monitor will use this parameter as reference baseline.

triggerThreshold.description: Threshold for the value monitor detection. The threshold is defined as the absolute difference between metafilter output and reference baseline.

consecutiveCountThreshold.description: Counting threshold for the residue is constantly above/below the trigger_threshold. While VM_DETECTOR_UNSTABLE is chosen, the counting threshold means the number of counts that residual(absolute difference between signal and baseline) is above the threshold. While VM_DETECTOR_STABLE is chosen, the counting threshold means the number of counts that residual (absolute difference between signal and baseline) is below the threshold.

frameToArmed.description: Number of frames for starting the scene change detection.

enable.description: Flag to enable median filter or not.
Flag to enable moving average filter or not.

numOfSamples.description: Length of the moving average filter.

enable.description: Flag to enable IIR filter or not.

coeffNumerator.description: IIR filter coefficient in numerator. An first order IIR filter is designed, the coefficients in numerator and denominator are typically required. This parameter defines the coefficient in the numerator.

coeffDenominator.description: IIR filter coefficient in denominator. An first order IIR filter is designed, the coefficients in numerator and denominator are typically required. This parameter defines the coefficient in the denominator.

triggerThreshold.description: Threshold for the value monitor detection. The threshold is defined as the absolute difference between metafilter output and reference baseline.

consecutiveCountThreshold.description: Counting threshold for the residue is constantly above/below the trigger_threshold. While VM_DETECTOR_UNSTABLE is chosen, the counting threshold means the number of counts that residual(absolute difference between signal and baseline) is above the threshold. While VM_DETECTOR_STABLE is chosen, the counting threshold means the number of counts that residual (absolute difference between signal and baseline) is below the threshold.
